fr.sylfrey.misTiGriD.electricalGrid

Interface Aggregator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sylfrey.misTiGriD.environment.Namable, Prosumer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AggregatorContainer, AggregatorImpl, RemoteAggregatorContainer

    public interface Aggregator
extends Prosumer
    Standard interface for grid aggregator services; a grid aggregator gets updated continuously by its prosuming children, cumulating all their prosumptions and prosuming the total from its own aggregator father.
    Author:
    syl
